content:
Sure, here's an example of a four-tier package pricing structure for a budget-friendly design service that focuses on helping businesses grow:

1. "Startup" - This package is designed for businesses that are just starting out and need a basic set of visual branding and marketing materials. It includes:
	* Basic logo design
	* Social media profile design
	* One web page design
	* A consultation call
	* Price: $500
2. "Growth" - This package is designed for businesses that are looking to take their visual branding and marketing to the next level. It includes:
	* Advanced logo design
	* Social media profile design
	* Five web page design
	* Two sets of graphics design
	* 1 Copywriting
	* A consultation call
	* Price: $1000
3. "Expansion" - This package is designed for businesses that are looking to expand their visual branding and marketing efforts. It includes:
	* UI/UX design
	* Five web page design
	* Four sets of graphics design
	* 2 Copywriting
	* Motion graphics
	* A consultation call
	* Price: $2000
4. "Pro" - This package is designed for businesses that want to go all-in on their visual branding and marketing efforts. It includes:
	* Full branding strategy
	* UI/UX design
	* Social media profile design
	* Ten web page design
	* Eight sets of graphics design
	* 4 Copywriting
	* Motion graphics
	* A consultation call
	* Price: $35
